transfer.description: Transfers tokens to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the owner.

transferToNear.description: Initiates a transfer of tokens to a NEAR account.

finaliseNearToEthTransfer.description: Finalizes a transfer of tokens from NEAR to Ethereum.

adminDelegatecall.description: Executes a delegate call to an admin-specified address.

adminPause.description: Pauses the contract with specified flags.

adminReceiveEth.description: Allows the contract to receive Ether.

adminSendEth.description: Allows the contract to send Ether to a specified address.

adminSstore.description: Stores a value in the contract's storage.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.

approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw tokens from the owner's account.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specified address.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender.

minBlockAcceptanceHeight.description: Returns the minimum block height required for acceptance.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nearConnector.description: Returns the connector used for NEAR integration.

paused.description: Returns the current pause status of the contract.

prover.description: Returns the address of the NEAR prover contract.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

usedProofs.description: Checks if a given proof has been used.
